import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ResumeService } from './resume.service'; import { ResumeInterface } from './resume.interface'; @Component({ selector: 'app-resume', templateUrl: './resume.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resume.component.css'] }) export class ResumeComponent implements OnInit { resumes: ResumeInterface [] = [] constructor(private resumeService: ResumeService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.resumes = this.resumeService.getResumes() } }
